Text:
i think 95% of pc games here have somebody declaring "virus". where's your proof ?. look up "false positive" 

thanks Kipp0 for upload

This is truly an old skool styled classic game, I love it to pieces. I have scanned with" avg internet security 2012" but Norton 360 did have a problem with one of the update files but check it at  http://www.introversion.co.uk/uplink/otherfiles.html
and its exactly identical to patch 1.55 off the main site. So I can only conclude is a Faults positive by Norton 360.
Thanks Very much for this upload Kipp0
I hope you can do some introversion packs like this one

in addiction
